title.narrative: Support to a Banja La Mtsogolo (BLM) Family Planning Project- Phase II

description.narrative: This activity (Support to a Banja La Mtsogolo (BLM) Family Planning Project- Phase II) is a component of Support to BANJA La MTSOGOLO reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £11,857,331. This component benefits Malawi, and works in the following sector(s): Family planning, STD control including HIV/AIDS. , with the following implementing partners: Banja La Mtsogolo Lilongwe Support Office. The start date is 01-07-2009 and the end date is 30-06-2015.

participating-org.narrative: Banja La Mtsogolo Lilongwe Support Office

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
